text: Ronald Prescott "Ron" Reagan (born May 20, 1958) is an American political commentator. He presents his commentary on the radio. He currently works for MSNBC as a political analyst. Reagan was born at Cedar-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, He is youngest son of Ronald Reagan and Nancy Reagan, He had one sister Patti Davis. Reagan is a Democrat and an atheist despite being the son of Republican President Ronald Reagan.Reagan, Ron. Making It Official: I Endorse Barack Obama. Huffington Post. October 31, 2008. His mother was Nancy Reagan. He is often incorrectly called Ronald Reagan Jr. or Ronald Reagan II. In 2011 he wrote a book on his father called My Father at 100. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Reagan family Category:American political commentators Category:American radio personalities Category:American political activists Category:Children of Presidents of the United States Category:Democrats (United States) Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Ron Reagan
